title: (x) Ung 06/07 Young Swedish Design - Dynamo Bold {Patricia, Brown Fox (self)}
content:
I can’t think of the name. Anyone?

 [‹ EMCO 100 logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20070629054428/http:/typophile.com/node/19477 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Esquire ad font - Infinity {Chris Keegan} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070629054428/http:/typophile.com/node/19475 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Brown Fox

comments.content: [Epokha](http://web.archive.org/web/20070629054428/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/epokha/) designed by Colin Brignall for Letraset. This was one of the two fonts I ever licensed.
Thanks Tiffany - are you sure? I know Epokha, it has few different features tho’? But Letraset is the right direction...
Actually I think it’s Dynamo Bold. This has come up before.
now I got it - Dynamo! Also on Letraset - thanks anyway...

Those young swedes love the ’70s Letrasetty fonts: [http://typographi.com/000402.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20070629054428/http:/typographi.com/000402.php "http://typographi.com/000402.php")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070629054428im_/http:/typophile.com/files/eva.gif)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070629054428im_/http:/typophile.com/files/paul.gif)

\> _Actually I think it’s Dynamo Bold. This has come up before._

[Indeed it has](http://web.archive.org/web/20070629054428/http:/www.typophile.com/node/17889).
